@TheStalwart This isn’t all that complicated.  The bitcoin blockchain is pseudonymous.  on-chain Transactions are publicly viewable, but without names attached.  If someone transacts with an entity that knows or can learn their name, the pseudonymous UTXOs can then be tied to real identities.
